diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with swelling and pain in the right leg and was previously diagnosed with Klippel-Trenaunay-Weber Syndrome (KTWS) 10 years prior. Physical examination revealed significant swelling of the right leg and tortuosity of superficial vessels. Imaging studies indicated the presence of an infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm and associated vascular changes consistent with the patientâ€™s known syndrome.
